thread.title: How One Company Set Out To Bring Accessibility (And Fashion) To Chronic Illness

author: FastCo Studios
title: How One Company Set Out To Bring Accessibility (And Fashion) To Chronic Illness
text: Care+Wear cofounders Susan Jones and Chat Razdan discuss the inception of one of their signature products—and how it’s changing lives.
